title: Escaping the Prison
description: Escaping the Prison is a wildly unique adventure puzzle game in which you aim to escape from prison! After being thrown in a prison cell, you must use anything and everything at your disposal to escape: teleporters, anti-gravity equipment, toilet plungers—nothing is off limits in your attempt to escape! But be careful because one wrong move or a split-second hesitation could send you right back to your cell—or worse!
